content: skill level easy size 0 3 months materials needed - 1 skein aran weight #4 yarn medium brown i used vanna s choice for this hat - 1 skein aran weight #4 yarn tan i used vanna s choice for this hat - small amount of aran weight #4 yarn in green for leaves again i used vanna s choice - button of your choice - crochet hook size g/4 00 mm - yarn needle used for working in loose yarn ends and for sewing the flower to the hat guage 12 double_crochet sts = 4 inches i crochet pretty loosely if you crochet tighter you may want to adjust to smaller hooks to get your desired size
